attributes.action: Sign the petition so my brother can have a decent grave
attributes.background: My fiver year old brother passed away in a house firer when he 5 years old and the Council wants us to remove his stuff and just to have a plan headstone we ain't allows to have anything on apart from flower we want him to be able to have a  ordinants on his grave like any other family would.

rejection.details:
We were very sorry to read about the death of your brother. Please accept our sincere condolences. 

We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for this issue. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could talk to a local councillor, who represents you, about this. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
